mapper.insert: insert into sanitary_data_fact(BEACH_SEQ, MONITOR_SITE_SEQ, ECOLI_SAMPLE_TYPE, SAMPLE_DATE_TIME, NO_GULLS, NO_GEESE, NO_DOGS, NO_ANIMALS_OTHER, ANIMALS_OTHER_DESC, NUM_LOONS, NUM_HERR_GULLS, NUM_RING_GULLS, NUM_CORMORANTS, NUM_LONGTAIL_DUCKS, NUM_SCOTER, NUM_HORN_GREBE, NUM_REDNECKED_GREBE, NUM_DEAD_FISH, NUM_OTHER, NUM_OTHER_DESC, FLOAT_STREET_LITTER, FLOAT_FOOD, FLOAT_MEDICAL, FLOAT_SEWAGE, FLOAT_BLDG_MATERIALS, FLOAT_FISHING, FLOAT_OTHER, FLOAT_OTHER_DESC, DEBRIS_STREET_LITTER, DEBRIS_FOOD, DEBRIS_MEDICAL, DEBRIS_SEWAGE, DEBRIS_BLDG_MATERIALS, DEBRIS_FISHING, DEBRIS_HOUSEHOLD, DEBRIS_TAR, DEBRIS_OIL, DEBRIS_OTHER, DEBRIS_OTHER_DESC, DEBRIS_AMOUNT, NO_IN_WATER, NUM_OUT_OF_WATER, NO_PEOPLE_BOATING, NO_PEOPLE_FISHING, NO_PEOPLE_SURFING, NO_PEOPLE_WINDSURFING, NO_PEOPLE_DIVING, NO_PEOPLE_CLAMMING, NO_PEOPLE_OTHER, NO_PEOPLE_OTHER_DESC, AIR_TEMP, AIR_UNITS, WIND_SPEED, WIND_SPEED_UNITS, WIND_DIR_DEGREES, WIND_DIR_DESC, WEATHER_DESC, RAINFALL_LAST_EVENT, RAINFALL, RAINFALL_UNITS, RAINFALL_STN_DESC, WAVE_HEIGHT, WAVE_HEIGHT_UNITS, EST_ACT_FLAG, WAVE_DIRECTION, WAVE_CONDITIONS, CURRENT_SPEED, LONGSHORE_CURRENT_UNITS, SHORELINE_CURRENT_DIR, PH, COLOR_CHANGE, COLOR_DESCRIPTION, ODOR_DESCRIPTION, ODOR_OTHER_DESCRIPTION, AVG_WATER_TEMP, AVG_WATER_TEMP_UNITS, CLARITY_DESC, NTU, SECCHI_TUBE_CM, ALGAE_NEARSHORE, ALGAE_ON_BEACH, ALGAE_TYPE_PERIPHYTON, ALGAE_TYPE_GLOBULAR, ALGAE_TYPE_FREEFLOATING, ALGAE_TYPE_OTHER, ALGAE_TYPE_OTHER_DESC, ALGAE_COLOR_LT_GREEN, ALGAE_COLOR_BRGHT_GREEN, ALGAE_COLOR_DRK_GREEN, ALGAE_COLOR_YELLOW, ALGAE_COLOR_BROWN, ALGAE_COLOR_OTHER, ALGAE_COLOR_OTHER_DESC, PART_1_COMMENTS, PART2_COMMENTS, PART3_COMMENTS, PART4_COMMENTS, SAMPLER_SEQ, DATA_ENTRY_SEQ) values( #{beachSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorSiteSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecoliSampleType, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=EcoliSampleTypeHandler}, #{sampleDateTime, jdbcType=DATE}, #{noGulls, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noGeese, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noDogs, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noAnimalsOther, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{animalsOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numLoons, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numHerrGulls, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numRingGulls, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numCormorants, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numLongtailDucks, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numScoter, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numHornGrebe, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numRedneckedGrebe, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numDeadFish, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numOther, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatStreetLitter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatFood, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatMedical, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatSewage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatBldgMaterials, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatFishing, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatOther, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floatOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisStreetLitter, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisFood, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisMedical, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisSewage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisBldgMaterials, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisFishing, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisHousehold, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisTar, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisOil, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisOther, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debrisAmount, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=PercentTypeHandler}, #{noInWater, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numOutOfWater, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleBoating, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleFishing, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleSurfing, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleWindsurfing, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numPeopleDiving, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleClamming, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleOther, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noPeopleOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airTemp, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{airUnits, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{windSpeed, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{windSpeedUnits, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=UnitsTypeHandler}, #{windDirDegrees, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{windDirDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weatherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=WeatherDescTypeHandler}, #{rainfallLastEvent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rainfall, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rainfallUnits, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rainfallStdDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waveHeight, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{waveHeightUnits, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=UnitsTypeHandler}, #{estActFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=EstActFlagTypeHandler}, #{waveDirection, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waveConditions, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentSpeed, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longshoreCurrentUnits, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shorelineCurrentDir, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pH, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{colorChange, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=StringBooleanYNTypeHandler}, #{colorDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odorDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=AllCapsTypeHandler}, #{odorOtherDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avgWaterTemp, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{avgWaterTempUnits, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clarityDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=AllCapsTypeHandler}, #{ntu, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{secchiTubeCm, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{algaeNearshore, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=PercentTypeHandler}, #{algaeOnBeach, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=PercentTypeHandler}, #{algaeTypePeriphyton, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeTypeGlobular, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeTypeFreefloating, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeTypeOther, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeTypeOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorLtGreen, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorBrightGreen, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorDrkGreen, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorYellow, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorBrown, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorOther, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algaeColorOtherDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{part1Comments, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{part2Comments, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{part3Comments, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{part4Comments, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{samplerSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataEntrySeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select person_id from bch_users where apex_name = #{value}
select count (*) from sanitary_data_fact where MONITOR_SITE_SEQ = #{MONITOR_SITE_SEQ} and SAMPLE_DATE_TIME = #{SAMPLE_DATE_TIME}
select count (*) from beach_dim where BEACH_SEQ = #{BEACH_SEQ}
select count (*) from monitor_site_dim where BEACH_SEQ = #{BEACH_SEQ} and MONITOR_SITE_SEQ = #{MONITOR_SITE_SEQ}
